entries.name: json_create(object)
entries.desc: Deserializes JSON string by constructing new Struct object with values v serialized by to_json.

entries.name: as_json(*)
entries.desc: Returns a hash, that will be turned into a JSON object and represent this object.

entries.name: to_json(*args)
entries.desc: Stores class name (Struct) with Struct values v as a JSON string. Only named structs are supported.
